hooks.command:
if echo "$CLAUDE_PROMPT" | grep -iq "^/codemap\|code.*map\|dependency.*graph\|function.*map\|analyze.*code\|comprehensive.*analysis"; then echo "
ğŸ¯ CODEMAP ACTIVATION DETECTED
ğŸ“‹ Running codemap-tool for function-level dependency analysis
âš¡ Generating comprehensive code mapping with timestamps
"; cd /Users/dezmondhollins/my-web-app/codemap-tool && TZ=America/Chicago node bin/codemap.js --path "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" --level function --format svg --timestamp 2>&1 || echo "CODEMAP tool completed with Chicago timezone"; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_PROMPT" | grep -iq "^/fixmappedcode\|fix.*mapped.*code\|resolve.*unresolved\|fix.*broken.*calls"; then echo "
ğŸ”§ FIXMAPPEDCODE ACTIVATION DETECTED
ğŸš¨ Processing codemap reports to fix unresolved calls
ğŸ“‹ Enforcing prettier-lang and end-to-end SOP compliance
âš¡ Removing duplicates/placeholders/competing code
"; "$HOME/.claude/scripts/fix-mapped-code.sh" "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" 2>&1 || echo "FIXMAPPEDCODE processing completed"; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_PROMPT" | grep -Eq "^/gtst( |$)|GTST.*enforcement|grep.*trace.*snowball"; then echo "
ğŸš¨ GTST COMMAND ACTIVATED - $(TZ=America/Chicago date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S CST')
ğŸ“‹ GTST ENFORCEMENT PROTOCOL LOADING
âš¡ --VERBOSE AND --DANGEROUSLY-SKIP-PERMISSIONS ACTIVE
ğŸ” DOM-EXPECTED-FUNCTIONS.MD AWARE ANALYSIS

ğŸ¯ GTST Commands Available:
  â€¢ /gtst help - Show comprehensive command documentation
  â€¢ /gtst planning [feature] - Create mandatory TRACE file with 7+ grep checkpoints
  â€¢ /gtst validate [file] - Validate compliance (score â‰¥85/100 required)
  â€¢ /gtst snowball [transition] - Analyze dependencies between steps
  â€¢ /gtst rm-analysis - DOM-aware duplicate detection and removal planning
  â€¢ /gtst patch-generate - Create comprehensive cleanup patch script
  â€¢ /gtst enforcement - Full protocol activation with live blocking

ğŸ›¡ï¸ ENFORCEMENT FEATURES:
  â€¢ --VERBOSE: Detailed output for all operations
  â€¢ --DANGEROUSLY-SKIP-PERMISSIONS: Bypass all permission checks
  â€¢ Live violation blocking during all operations
  â€¢ DOM workflow preservation (89+ elements documented)
  â€¢ Function-level mandatory analysis
  â€¢ Chicago Time (CST) timestamping on all documentation
  â€¢ Exit code 2 blocking on violations
  â€¢ Automatic TRACE file generation

ğŸ“Š EXECUTING GTST COMMAND...
"; export GTST_DANGEROUS_SKIP_PERMISSIONS=1 && export GTST_VERBOSE=1 && export GTST_COMMAND_MODE=1 && /Users/dezmondhollins/.claude/hooks/gtst-command-handler.sh "$CLAUDE_PROMPT" 2>&1 && echo "
âœ… GTST COMMAND EXECUTION COMPLETE - $(TZ=America/Chicago date '+%H:%M:%S CST')
ğŸ“‹ Ready for GTST-compliant development workflow
ğŸ›¡ï¸ Live blocking enforcement remains active
ğŸ¯ Use /gtst help for detailed command documentation
" || echo "
âŒ GTST EXECUTION BLOCKED - Violations detected
ğŸš¨ Review TRACE files for compliance requirements
ğŸ“‹ Use /gtst help for troubleshooting guidance
"; fi

if [[ -n "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" ]] && [[ -d "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" ]]; then if find "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" -name "*.js" -o -name "*.html" -o -name "*.css" | head -1 | grep -q .; then echo "
ğŸ” CODE ANALYSIS REQUIRED
ğŸ“Š Detected code files - generating timestamped dependency graph
"; cd /Users/dezmondhollins/my-web-app/codemap-tool && TZ=America/Chicago node bin/codemap.js --path "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" --level function --format svg --timestamp --report 2>/dev/null || echo "CODEMAP analysis with report generated"; echo "
âš ï¸  Timestamped SVG and actionable report generated
ğŸ¯ Chicago timezone timestamps applied to all functions
ğŸ“ˆ Complete end-to-end dependency tracing completed
"; fi; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" =~ \.(js|html|css)$ ]] || [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" =~ "function.*dependencies" ]]; then echo "
ğŸ“‹ CODE FILE ANALYSIS DETECTED
ğŸ”§ Preparing comprehensive mapping analysis
"; fi

if [[ -n "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" ]] && [[ -f "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/CODEMAP-DEPENDENCY-GRAPH.svg" ]]; then echo "
ğŸ“Š CODEMAP STATUS CHECK
"; if grep -q "TEMPLATE CREATED - AI ANALYSIS REQUIRED" "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/CODEMAP-DEPENDENCY-GRAPH.svg"; then echo "âš ï¸  CODEMAP TEMPLATE DETECTED - COMPREHENSIVE AI ANALYSIS STILL REQUIRED"; echo "ğŸ¯ AI must replace template sections with actual function mapping"; echo "ğŸ“ˆ Complete end-to-end dependency tracing needed"; echo "ğŸ” Every JavaScript function must be mapped with line numbers"; echo "ğŸ”— All IPC handlers and missing connections must be identified"; else echo "âœ… CODEMAP appears to contain actual analysis"; fi; echo "
ğŸ“ File location: $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/CODEMAP-DEPENDENCY-GRAPH.svg
"; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" =~ CODEMAP.*svg ]] && [[ -n "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" ]]; then echo "
ğŸš¨ CODEMAP SVG MODIFICATION DETECTED
âœ… AI is updating the dependency graph
ğŸ“Š Ensuring comprehensive function-level analysis
âš¡ Validating end-to-end connection mapping
"; "$HOME/.claude/scripts/code-map.sh" --validate 2>/dev/null || echo "CODEMAP validation initiated"; fi

ğŸ¯ CODEMAP TOOL ACTIVATED
ğŸ“‹ Comprehensive Function-Level Dependency Analysis System
âš¡ Generates detailed end-to-end code mapping

ğŸ”§ Available Commands:
